scripts.watch-server: nodemon --ignore server/tests/ --watch server/src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node server/src/index.ts
scripts.build-all: npm audit --production && rm -rf dist && npm run build-shared && npm run build-server && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin && echo COMPLETED
scripts.build-server: npm install && rm -rf dist/src && tsc --target es2018 && cp -v -r package-lock.json server/package.json READ* LICENSE* plugins dist && cd dist && npm ci --production && cd .. && node afterbuild
scripts.exe-dist: pkg . -C brotli && cd dist && mv -f hfs-win.exe hfs.exe && zip plugins.zip -r plugins
scripts.new-dist: npm run build-all && npm run zip-dist && npm run exe-dist
